sentences.en: And let it direct your passion with reason, that your passion may live through its own daily resurrection, and like the phoenix rise above its own ashes.
sentences.cn: 让你们的灵魂以理性引导热情的方向，这样你们的热情才会经历每日的复活，宛若凤凰从自己的灰烬中再生。

sentences.en: And suddenly, there he was, like a phoenix rising from the ashes.
sentences.cn: 突然, 他出现了, 就像凤凰浴火重生.

sentences.en: At 14 , he went to high school in Phoenix, Arizona.
He was reading The Phoenix Gazette.
It is divided into Dragon Skill and Phoenix Skill.
sentences.cn: 它被区分为龙技术和凤凰城技术.

sentences.en: No, they moved to Phoenix half a year ago.
sentences.cn: 不是, 他们半年前已搬到费尼克斯了.

sentences.en: Out of the ashes of the economic shambles, a phoenix of recovery can arise.
sentences.cn: 在经济废墟中可能孕育着经济复苏的苗头。

sentences.en: Phoenix only waited and stared straight ahead, her face very solemn and withdrawn into rigidity.
sentences.cn: 菲尼克斯只是等待着,眼睛直视着前方, 庄重的脸色变得严峻起来.

sentences.en: Results Concordant ID of 90.0 % was observed for Enterococci between Phoenix - 100 and API.
sentences.cn: 结果与API鉴定 系统相比,Phoenix -100 系统鉴定肠球菌的一致率为90.0%.

sentences.en: She started a new business in Phoenix not long ago.
sentences.cn: 不久前她在凤凰城新开了一家公司.

sentences.en: That orientation apparently developed when he was growing up in Phoenix, Ariz.
sentences.cn: 显然他的这种意念是他在菲尼斯成长过程中形成的.

sentences.en: The airline rose like a phoenix from the ashes.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司又起死回生了.

sentences.en: The constructor arguments are actually Phoenix lambda expressions, so you can use arbitrarily complex expressions.
sentences.cn: 构造函数参数实际上是Phoenix的λ表达式, 因此你可以使用任意复杂的表达式.

sentences.en: Was your school here in Phoenix?
sentences.cn: 你的那个学校在Phoenix这 吗 ?

sentences.en: We fly here personally last night from Phoenix to speak toyou.
sentences.cn: 我们从菲尼克斯飞过来跟你协商.

sentences.en: Ziyi as I look forward to a spokesman for the Phoenix Shuicheng.
sentences.cn: 章子怡本人对于出任凤凰水城代言人充满期待.

phrases.phrase: rise like a phoenix from the ashes

trans.tran_cn: 凤凰，长生鸟（神话中的鸟，在阿拉伯沙漠中，可活数百年，然后自焚为灰而再生），菲尼克斯 （美国城市）
trans.tran_en: a magic bird that is born from a fire, according to ancient stories
